Issue.creator: caod
Issue.summary: Simplify NewCreateChannelTx to only consider an application channel
Issue.description: An application channel only needs to specify the consortium name, org names, and application level values/policies. We shouldn't need to extend it with defining org specific values/anchor peers/orderer config, etc. Currently the NewCreateChannelTx considers creation of a system channel and also creates a creates a Consortiums group and orderer group. Let's consider system channel creation for the future and simplify the existing logic to just be for new application channels.
